Detailed Description

API for access to the XMP Toolkit iteration services.

TXMPIterator is the template class providing iteration services for the XMP Toolkit. It must be instantiated with a string class such as std::string. See the instructions in XMP.hpp, and the Overview for a discussion of the overall architecture of the XMP API.

XMP-Toolkit-SDK-4.4.2 documentation generated by doxygen 1.5.6
